articles.title: Premier Inspects Wonsan-Kalma Coastal Tourist Area under Construction
articles.content:
Premier Inspects Wonsan-Kalma Coastal Tourist Area under Construction
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, made a field survey of the Wonsan-Kalma coastal tourist area under construction and the livestock farming base in the Sepho area.
					 Going round various parts of the tourist area under construction, he encouraged its builders who were waging a vigorous offensive, creating a Mallima speed.
					
					 A consultative meeting held on the spot discussed measures to settle the problems arising in the construction project in time.
					
					 He also went round the livestock farming base in the Sepho area, stressing the need to increase the production of meat, egg and milk by establishing a proper breeding-system and meticulously organizing the breeding and caring of domestic animals and the manuring and cultivation of grass fields.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Turkmenistan
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Turkmenistan
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government delegation headed by Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho arrived in Ashkhabad on April 6 to visit Turkmenistan.
					 On the same day the delegation left Baku after participating in the foreign minister's meeting of the non-aligned movement held in Azerbaijan.
					
					 Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho met the foreign ministers of Azerbaijan and Serbia and the secretary of State of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Cambodia during his stay.

articles.title: Delegation of Foreign Ministry Comes Back
articles.content:
Delegation of Foreign Ministry Comes Back
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK led by Vice-Minister Choe Hui Chol came back home on Saturday after visiting Singapore.

articles.title: Delegation of "Prominent Personages in Asia" Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of "Prominent Personages in Asia" Leaves
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of "Prominent Personages in Asia" headed by Dino Patti Djalal, founder of the Foreign Policy Community of Indonesia, left here on Saturday.
					 During the visit the delegation met with officials concerned of the DPRK-Asia Association and the Ministry of External Economic Relations and exchanged views on the issues of mutual concern including the development of relations between the DPRK and other Asian countries and the situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It held an academic seminar at Kim Il Sung University and toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, Panmunjom, the Ryuwon Footwear Factory, etc.

articles.title: Poster for 20th Kimilsungia Festival Produced
articles.content:
Poster for 20th Kimilsungia Festival Produced
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A poster was produced for the 20th Kimilsungia Festival to be held here on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Depicted in the poster is the immortal flower Kimilsungia in full bloom against the background of the sky in spring with the fascinating drifting fireworks.
					
					 Written there are the slogan "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us" and letters "The Day of the Sun", "Celebration" and "The 20th Kimilsungia Festival". Also reflected there are the logo of the festival and its venue and period.

articles.title: 23rd Cooking Festival
articles.content:
23rd Cooking Festival
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The 23rd Cooking Festival took place at the Pyongyang Noodle House in Rangnang District, Pyongyang some days ago to celebrate the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Held on its first day was the exhibition of famous dishes presented by restaurants under the General Bureau of Public Catering Service, national institutions and provincial public catering establishments.
					
					 What drew attention of visitors was the entertaining and serving contest in which the public catering establishment from South Hamgyong Province and Hyangmanru Restaurant in Pyongyang won high appraisal for their tasty dishes and good service.
					
					 The festival also included the exhibition of compulsory dishes, cooking demonstrations of management staffs, cooks and waiters, cooking contest of students and exhibition of sci-tech achievements made in cooking to be highly admired by spectators.
					
					 The festival came to be an important occasion in developing the cooking techniques and culinary culture of the country and improving cooks' skills and abilities.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Derides Japan's Immature Politics
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Derides Japan's Immature Politics
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Japan persists in pursuing immature politics against the trend of the times.
					 Japan's Foreign Minister Kono talked rubbish chilling the atmosphere of dialogue on the Korean peninsula at a recent lecture, only to be censured by the public at home and abroad. He said that "one should not respond in haste to north Korea's 'charm offensive'" and "there is no need to hurry as north Korea may take advantage of it".
					
					 Commenting on such ill language often let out by the Abe government, Asahi Shimbun said "Japan fears that it might be isolated in the hot wind of north Korea-centered diplomacy in Northeast Asia", adding "people are concerned that Japan might be left alone under the rapidly changing situation."
					
					 As recognized by the public, the Abe government's trite hard-line policy and attitude toward the DPRK are no more than grumbling by the lonely island nation which was sidelined under the developing regional situation.
					
					 The phenomenon of "alienating Japan", of which it is now much concerned, was just brought by Japan itself, not by anyone else.
					
					 Japan is ahead of others in the geographic time zone but is always the last of the region and among the international community in the political time table. Its politics must be problematic.
					
					 Different from some opinions about smart "Japan's politics", the Abe government's short-sighted and backward politics are the worst ever in history.
					
					 Its authorities' language is run through with crude words and unilateral attitude betraying their ill intention to seek their interests only by disregarding the demand and interests of neighboring countries or by abusing them.
					
					 As for its hard-line policy hostile toward the DPRK, Japan persists in pursuing it in order to not only turn its home politics into reactionary and ultra-right ones but also step up rearmament and become a military giant.
					
					 That's why Japan was forsaken by the countries in the region calling for stability and atmosphere of reconciliation while keeping sharp vigilance against the moves of Japan. It is bound to be sidelined in the current trend of situation.
					
					 Recently, it invited others to tighten "cooperation in pressurizing" the DPRK, crying out for monitoring its "sea smuggling" and talking about "sharing of burden and observation", but got only silent or frosty receptions.
					
					 Japan is a country of Asia but is an island country apart from the Asian continent.
					
					 It should know that it can never change its fate as a politically isolated "lonely island nation" if it fails to face up to the demand and the trend in the region.

articles.title: S. Korea: Park Geun Hye Given Heavy Penalty by Court
articles.content:
S. Korea: Park Geun Hye Given Heavy Penalty by Court
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Central District Court sentenced traitor Park Geun Hye, chief architect of high-profile graft, to 24 years in prison and fined her on Friday, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 Traitor Park was reportedly found guilty for 16 of 18 crimes indicted.

articles.title: Crackdown upon Labor Movement Revealed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Crackdown upon Labor Movement Revealed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean MBC on March 31 said it was disclosed through a prosecution's report on investigation that the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors set in motion the Intelligence Service to disorganize and crack down on the progressive labor unions.
					 It was reported that the IS by the order of traitor Lee Myung Bak worked out a plan for setting up a "sound federation of trade unions" in a bid to suppress and destroy anti-"government" and progressive labor unions and squandered hundred millions of won to carry it out.
					
					 The IS also posted on websites the false articles branding the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, National Teachers Union and the Government Employees' Union as "pro-north" organizations.

articles.title: Int'l Kim Il Sung Prize Conferred on IIJI Director-General
articles.content:
Int'l Kim Il Sung Prize Conferred on IIJI Director-General
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The International Kim Il Sung Prize Council decided on April 6 to award International Kim Il Sung Prize to Ramon Jimenez Lopez, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI).
					 He has made a remarkable contribution to the global cause of independence and peace, ardently following the immortal Juche idea.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for marking the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed by the Amur Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on Mar. 30.
					 First Secretary L. A. Kobuizov was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee fixed a celebration period from April 3 to 17 and decided to hold colorful political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Congo
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Congo
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A Congolese preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed in Brazzaville on Mar. 30.
					 Vital Balla, chairman of the Congolese Association for Friendship among Peoples, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from April 1 to 30 and decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and feats of the President and the personality of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as the great man through media and hold colorful political and cultural events such as meeting, lecture and film show in the period.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Italy
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Italy
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed in Rome on April 1.
					 Alfonso Galdi, director of the International Department of the Communist Party of Italy, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee fixed a celebration period from April 1 to 30 and decided to hold colorful political and cultural events such as meeting, seminar, film show and book and photo exhibition in the period.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre el campo de construccion de zona turistica y la base ganadera de Sepho
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre el campo de construccion de zona turistica y la base ganadera de Sepho
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, averiguo en el terreno las gestiones del campo de construccion de la zona turistica costera Wonsan-Kalma y la base ganadera en la zona de Sepho.
					Recorriendo varios puntos del campo de construccion, el premier estimulo a los constructores quienes libran una tensa ofensiva bajo la llamarada de creacion de velocidad de Mallima.
					
					En la reunion de consulta convocada en el terreno, se discutieron los remedios para resolver a tiempo los problemas surgidos en la obra.
					
					Durante su visita a la base ganadera de Sepho, instruyo aumentar la produccion de carne, huevos y leche al establecer el sistema de reproduccion y organizar bien la cria de ganados y el abonamiento de herbazales.

articles.title: Delegacion gubernamental de la RPDC llega a Turkmenistan
articles.content:
Delegacion gubernamental de la RPDC llega a Turkmenistan
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- La delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Ri Yong Ho, llego el dia 6 a Ashkhabad para realizar una visita a Turkmenistan.
					El mismo dia, la delegacion salio de Baku tras participar en la reunion de cancilleres del Movimiento de los No Alineados, sesionada en Azerbaijan.
					
					Durante la permanencia, Ri Yong Ho se reunio con sus homologos de Azerbaijan y Serbia y el secretario de Estado del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y Cooperacion Internacional de Camboya.

articles.title: Editada pancarta del XX Festival de Kimilsungias
articles.content:
Editada pancarta del XX Festival de Kimilsungias
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Se dio a luz la pancarta del XX Festival de Kimilsungias a efectuarse en esta capital con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					En ella esta dibujada la kimilsungia florecida a plenitud y en su trasfondo se ve el cielo de primavera coronado con fuegos artificiales.
					
					Se leen la consigna "El Presidente Kim Il Sung vive siempre en nosotros" y las palabras "Dia del Sol", "Festejo" y "El XX Festival de Kimilsungias" y estan inscritos el emblema del festival y su sede y periodo, etc.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la falta de vision politica de Japon
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la falta de vision politica de Japon
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Se reportan de continuo los casos que muestran la inmadurez politica de Japon que no sabe distinguir la tendencia actual.
					 En una reciente conferencia, el canciller japones Kono dijo que "no se debe reaccionar con precipitacion a la 'ofensiva atractiva' del Norte de Corea" y "no hay ninguna necesidad de darse prisa y esto puede ser abusado por el Norte de Corea".
					
					  Es criticada dentro y fuera del pais esta chismografia que envenena el ambiente de dialogo de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Con respecto a tales actos verbales del gobierno de Abe, Asahi Shimbun transmitio que Japon "tiene miedo a que sea aislado en la oleada diplomatica que se levanta en el nordeste asiatico en torno al Norte de Corea" y "los habitantes japoneses se preocupan de que su pais se queda solitario a pesar del brusco cambio de la situacion regional".
					
					  Como reconoce todo el mundo, la invariable politica y actitud hostiles e intransigentes anti-RPDC del gobierno de Abe no pasan de ser el refunfuno del pais isla marginado de la corriente de la situacion regional.
					
					  El fenomeno de "Japon menospreciado" se ha buscado este mismo pais.
					
					  Es decir, la politica de Japon es el factor que le pone a la zaga de la sociedad regional e internacional en el cronograma politico, a pesar de su primera posicion en el geografico.
					
					La corta vision politica del gobierno de Abe se torna la peor de la historia de Japon.
					
					  El acto verbal de las actuales figuras gubernamentales de ese pais es el vulgar y unilateral que persigue unicamente los intereses propios sin hacer caso o abusando de las demandas e intereses de los paises vecinos.
					
					  En el caso de la politica hostil contra la RPDC, es utilizada de manera prolongada para justificar el caracter reaccionario y ultraderechista de la politica japonesa y el rearme y la conversion del pais isla en una potencia militar. Por esta razon, es rechazada por los paises regionales que reclaman la estabilidad y el clima de reconciliacion.
					
					  Sucedio lo mismo con el reciente intento de Japon de involucrar a otros paises en la "cooperacion en presionar" a la RPDC bajo pretextos de vigilar las "actividades de contrabando maritimo", el "compartimiento de cargas" y la "distribucion de tareas de vigilancia".
					
					  Japon es un pais de Asia, pero el isleno alejado geograficamente del continente asiatico.
					
					  Debe conocer que si no conoce la demanda y la tendencia actual, no podra eludir jamas el destino de "pais solitario" tambien en el sentido politico.
